Alloy, 31.8mm SEAT BINDER Alloy, 2-bolt, micro-adjust, 12.5mm offset, 27.2mm, anti-corrosion hardware SEATPOST Body Geometry Targa Sport, steel rails, 155mm SADDLE Standard Schrader valve INNER TUBES Specialized Trigger Sport, 60TPI, wire bead, 700x38c REAR TIRE Specialized Trigger Sport, 60TPI, wire bead, 700x38c FRONT TIRE Stainless, 14g SPOKES Double-sealed, QR, 32h REAR HUB Double-sealed, QR, 32h FRONT HUB
textAfterTable: VIEW Tech and Design > Tech Features M4 AND A1 PREMIUM ALUMINUM FRAMES WHAT Lightweight, fully butted Premium Aluminum tubing. WHY Premium Aluminum tubing creates the best balance of weight, strength, and compliance. HOW By controlling everything from the raw material to the extrusion, butting, swaging and heat treatment of the tubes we can optimize our Crosstrail frame for an extremely light and stiff all-road experience. INTEGRATED SUSPENSION FORK WHAT Custom suspension fork with integrated crown design. Remote hydraulic lockout function from the handlebar (select models). WHY Integrated crown design for a sleek and straight downtube. HOW Proprietary, custom designed suspension fork crown enables a unique downtube, headtube and fork crown unit. With a lockout, you gain more efficiency on any surface.
